description: Works well with my SWFs and has a UI that actually looks like a blast back to Windows Vista. As well as +1 reputation for being open source.

The decompiler itself has some issues when using a raw SWF sometimes, but it has an automatic deobfuscation feature that works well enough.

The CLI is excellent and the devs respond to any issues very quickly. As someone who is building an application on top of JPEXS, I would highly recommend it.
